DOC.brief_title: The Effects Glycemic Optimization Before Gastric Bypass Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study involve 150 patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) obesity . One hundred patient undergo gastric bypass surgery whilst 50 treated best medical care . The surgical patient group randomise either immediate surgery 3 month medical glycaemic optimisation follow surgery ( n=50 group ) . Intervention Group A : Patients undergo gastric bypass surgery within 3 month randomisation without pre operative optimisation glycaemic control . Group B : Patients undergo gastric bypass 3-6 month randomisation . During period group receive modern best medical care base American Diabetes Association ( ADA ) /European Association Study Diabetes ( EASD ) guideline . Glycaemic optimisation achieve particular attention avoidance hypoglycaemia . Group C : Obese patient T2DM ( choose surgery ) treat best medical care base ADA/EASD guideline include anti-diabetes/obesity pharmacotherapy , access train dietician exercise programme .
